articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: American Airlines is deploying new tech to shame boarding line cutters - TechCrunch
articles.description: American Airlines has a new tactic for shaming boarding line cutters: A loud beeper.
articles.content:
American Airlines has a new tactic for shaming boarding line cutters: A loud beeper.
CNBC reports that the airline is rolling out a system that emits two loud beeps when a traveler tries to get on a… [+639 chars]
